stable.title: Tastic Mesh Firmware v0.0.7
stable.release_notes: Fixed firmware file extraction and deployment. Files now properly renamed to flat structure for direct web access. Improved debugging and support for .hex files.

stable.title: Tastic Mesh Firmware v0.0.6
stable.release_notes: Enhanced GitHub Pages deployment with improved firmware extraction and proper file naming. Supports Tracker T1000-E, Seeed XIAO nRF52840 Kit, and Heltec WiFi LoRa 32 V3.

stable.title: Tastic Mesh Firmware v0.0.5
stable.release_notes: Three board support! Added Heltec WiFi LoRa 32 V3. Includes firmware for nRF52840 devices (XIAO, Tracker) and ESP32-S3 devices (Heltec V3). Note: Web flasher shows one board at a time - select your device to get the appropriate firmware.
